Acerca del empleo
senior backend engineer to build clean, maintainable, and well-tested backend code. You will collaborate with product and engineering to define, prioritize, and build, and design and architect backend REST APIs.

Deep experience with modern backend technologies like Python, Django, Node.js, building micro-services etc

Professional experience in web3 and startups

Employment Type: Full-Time

Salary: $ 130,000.00 180,000.00 Per Year
